languages.text: "Провидец... Иремерисс хватило ума притащить в Комморру провидца — лишь для того, чтобы попотчевать им какое-то отребье с нижних отсеков Темного города?"
"A Farseer... Yremeryss had the temerity to bring a Farseer to Commorragh, only to feed it to some scum from the Dark City's gutters?"
languages.original_text: "Провидец... Иремерисс хватило ума притащить в Комморру провидца — лишь для того, чтобы попотчевать им какое-то отребье с нижних отсеков Темного города?"

traits.locale_text: "A seer... Yremeriss had the temerity to bring a seer to Commorragh only to feed it to some scum from the Dark City's gutters?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Un Grand Prophète... Yremeryss a eu l'audace d'amener un Grand Prophète à Commorragh, dans le seul but de le livrer à la racaille de la Cité Crépusculaire ? »
languages.original_text: "A Farseer... Yremeryss had the temerity to bring a Farseer to Commorragh, only to feed it to some scum from the Dark City's gutters?"

traits.locale_text: « Un Grand Prophète... Yremeryss a eu l'audace d'amener un Grand Prophète à Commorragh, dans le seul but de le livrer à la racaille de la Cité Crépusculaire ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “一个先知……伊芮梅莉斯好大的胆子，居然敢把先知带到科摩罗？就为了把他喂给阴沟里的渣滓吗？”
languages.original_text: "A Farseer... Yremeryss had the temerity to bring a Farseer to Commorragh, only to feed it to some scum from the Dark City's gutters?"

traits.locale_text: “一个先知……伊芮梅莉斯好大的胆子，居然敢把先知带到科摩罗？就为了把他喂给阴沟里的渣滓吗？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「先見司だと…イレメリスは仄暗き都の貧民街のクズどもを食わせるためだけに、無謀にも先見司をコモラフに連れて行ったというのか？」
languages.original_text: "A Farseer... Yremeryss had the temerity to bring a Farseer to Commorragh, only to feed it to some scum from the Dark City's gutters?"

traits.locale_text: 「先見司だと…イレメリスは仄暗き都の貧民街のクズどもを食わせるためだけに、無謀にも先見司をコモラフに連れて行ったというのか？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ein Runenprophet ... Yremeryss hatte die Frechheit, einen Runenpropheten mit nach Commorragh zu bringen, und dann verfüttert sie ihn an irgendeinen Gossenabschaum aus der Dunklen Stadt?"
languages.original_text: "A Farseer... Yremeryss had the temerity to bring a Farseer to Commorragh, only to feed it to some scum from the Dark City's gutters?"

traits.locale_text: "Ein Runenprophet ... Yremeryss hatte die Frechheit, einen Runenpropheten mit nach Commorragh zu bringen, und dann verfüttert sie ihn an irgendeinen Gossenabschaum aus der Dunklen Stadt?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Un vidente... ¿Yremeryss se ha atrevido a traer un vidente a Commorragh solo para echárselo de comer a una escoria de cloaca de la Ciudad Siniestra?».
languages.original_text: "A Farseer... Yremeryss had the temerity to bring a Farseer to Commorragh, only to feed it to some scum from the Dark City's gutters?"

traits.locale_text: «Un vidente... ¿Yremeryss se ha atrevido a traer un vidente a Commorragh solo para echárselo de comer a una escoria de cloaca de la Ciudad Siniestra?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ötesezen demek... Yremeryss, Commorragh'a bir Ötesezen getirmeye cüret etmiş ama kalkmış, Kara Şehir'in it kopuğuna mı yem etmiş?"
languages.original_text: "A Farseer... Yremeryss had the temerity to bring a Farseer to Commorragh, only to feed it to some scum from the Dark City's gutters?"

traits.locale_text: "Ötesezen demek... Yremeryss, Commorragh'a bir Ötesezen getirmeye cüret etmiş ama kalkmış, Kara Şehrin it kopuğuna mı yem etmiş?"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
